You are invited to participate in Asia’s premier investor relations event. Ipreo Wisdom Investor Relations Summit
Register now Click the link below to register for Beijing, Hong Kong, Taipei or Singapore. The event is complimentary.
Register
If you are unable to access this link, simply email marketing@ipreo.com to register
THE AGENDA: A FULL-DAY, IN-DEPTH WORKSHOP WITH PEER-TO-PEER DISCUSSIONS, WILL INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING THEMES:
Investment Climate: Market strategies and economists detail their outlook for the economy and equity investments in the region.
Investor Relations: Discussions on global best practices with leading IROs from the region and beyond.
Views from the Buy Side: Hear how investors put their assets to work and how IR plays a role in attracting capital.
Corporate Governance & Proxy Voting:
Understand the critical corporate governance topics that impact management and boards from influential proxy voting policy makers
Corporate Access
A review of best practices and new technologies impacting interactions between the Buy Side, the Sell Side and Issuers
